price: Kandi nibashaka kukuryarya, mu by’ukuri, Allah araguhagije. Ni We waguteye inkunga y’ubutabazi bwe n’iy’abemeramana.
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yurīdū an yakhdaʿūka fa-inna ḥasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhī ayyadaka binaṣrihi wabil-mu'minīna
